title: Teaching Assistant at University of Minnesota
info: Assisted in freshmen seminar class, Survey of Computer Science using computer games
Helped students who exposed Unreal Engine 4 for the first time

title: Squad Commander at Korean Army Training Center
info: Directed new Korean soldiers, who joined the army for the first time to adjust in Korean army
Awarded with 'the most motivational squad commander chosen by trainers', from Korean Army Training Center Major General
